availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Caleb Warfield (Lyon Co, Ky, brick layer)

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, brick layer. Kentucky native. Master brick layer in Eddyville, Kentucky, in 1860. Employed Alexander Drake and Amos C. Perkins as laborers in Eddyville in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Lyon County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, Eddyville, p. 760.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, Eddyville, p. 12 / 12 on microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
